collectible.title: Oracle Turret
collectible.subtitle: I'm different.
collectible.text:
"Prometheus was punished by the gods for giving the gift of knowledge to man. He was cast into the bowels of the earth and pecked by birds."

A non-hostile turret you found somewhere in Aperture Science Laboritories after visiting with Chell. It occasionally speaks in cryptic non sequitur, but you can't shake the feeling they mean something.
collectible.unlock: Play with Chell again after visiting Aperture Science Laboratories.

collectible.title: Faded Tri-fold
collectible.subtitle: Energy of the Future!
collectible.text:
A faded tri-fold board made for Aperture Science Bring your Daughter to Work Day, seemingly for some kind of science fair. It details an experiment on patoto batteries, a rather popular theme for this particular fair.

It is signed "by Chell".
